text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale you know this
episode of Laura in the kitchen I wanted
to share with you my recipe for a
succulent marinated curled steak I can't
really come up with a better word for it
cuz that's just what we call it so I'm
sticking with it it's very simple and
easy and it is just absolutely delicious
you're going to need some fresh garlic
and some green onions that I've just
roughly chopped and I've given the
garlic a nice smash but it's unpeeled
but still whole I've got some soy sauce
and Worcestershire sauce and salt free
steak seasoning and a little bit of
olive oil and the stakes of your choice
these are a New York Strip but you can
use any state that you want now let's
get going in a little Bowl I'm going to
mix together my soy sauce and
Worcestershire sauce along with a little
bit of olive oil and my salt free steak
seasoning now make sure that your steak
seasoning is salt free because you have
a lot of soy sauce there and that is
going to be the salty component that's
going to that's going to season your
steak so all I'm doing is I'm taking a
fork and I am just kind of freaking it
all over so then that way the marinade
you can seep down in there and now I am
going to take my marinade you can see I
have this you know the head of steaks
fit it pretty nice and tight you know in
a shallow bowl here and the reason why
you want that is because you want the
steaks to be pretty much covered in that

the Marigny would kind of run out

really sort of wrap around the steak I'm
also going to add in some of all of the

sticking the garlic underneath and I'm
not chopping the garlic because when I
go to grill this I don't want the garlic
to burn so I'm going to fish the garlic
out later but I like to put the garlic
underneath the steak so the steak is
sitting on the garlic and giving you
lots of flavor there
and now I'm going to wrap this with some
plastic wrap and I'm going to stick
these into the fridge for several hours
I'm probably going to leave it in there
for a good three hours but you can leave

because we kind of put them with a fork
a little bit see that that is gorgeous
now I've got my grill pan here you can
do these on the steaks
these steaks outside on your grill that

between medium high around medium-high
heat not too too high not too too low
you want a good sear but you don't want

my steaks grilled for exactly four
